response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. Considering its unique features and unparalleled quality, we are offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. This is an exclusive chance to own a piece that could potentially grow in value over time, making it a wise investment. We are confident that this offer presents an excellent opportunity for both parties involved. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
